DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess efficacy safety selective dorsal rhizotomy physiotherapy compare physiotherapy alone improve gross motor function reduce spasticity child spastic diplegia .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Randomized Study Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy Physiotherapy Vs Physiotherapy Alone Spastic Diplegia
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients stratified age ability ambulate 50 foot unaided . Each stratum block randomize . Patients randomly assign surgery plus intensive physical therapy versus intensive physical therapy alone . The surgical procedure selective dorsal rhizotomy . Physical therapy ( PT ) include passive active range motion , facilitation isolate muscle control , transitional movement , strengthen , transfer skill , gait training . The PT schedule 2-hour session 5 day week 1 month , 1-hour session 5 day week 5 month , standard therapy program remainder study ( total 6 month ) . Parents supervise exercise non-PT day . Patients follow 6 , 12 , 24 month .
